General.Name: Mobile Max-M
General.Description: Bubbles Intergroup Ltd develops and licenses patent-pending unified communication (UC) solutions and mobile least cost routing technology to service providers, carriers, and IP/PBX providers in Israel. The company offers MobileMax UC Suite, which allows carriers to launch mobile UC applications that include business/private calling, remote office, do not disturb, call forwarding, call retrieve/grab/move, conference calling and call transfer, mobile extension dialing, corporate/group directory, etc.; IM, XMPP and SIP presence, and telephony presence; and mobile VoIP softphone and click 2 call solutions. It also provides MobileMax Server, a provisioning tool that generates MobileMax applications on the fly configured to its customers' requirements and sends them to end user's mobile phones. The company was formerly known as Mobile Max Technologies Ltd and changed its name to Bubbles Intergroup Ltd in August 2022. Bubbles Intergroup Ltd was founded in 2004 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

2.Name: Dr. Daniel  Zellinger
